content: What is the PHP code that can be used to validate the minimum word count of 500 for each book review submitted on our website? Also, can you provide examples of how to use this code to check the word count of each of the following genres: mystery, romance, and science fiction? Additionally, can you provide a PHP code example that uses the provided HTML template to display the book title, author, summary, analysis, and recommendation for each review on our website?
